Intercensal survival estimates of 15q60 based on Li-Gerland (2012). Replicate examples from spreadsheet "OldMortPG.xls"

census_method.Rd

Adapted from matlab code provided from PG.

Usage

census_method(c1, c2, age, date1, date2)

Arguments

c1

numeric vector. Population at observation 1.

c2

numeric vector. Population at observation 2.

age

integer vector. Lower bound of age groups from first census. Last age is assumed as lower age open age group.

date1

Either a Date class object or an unambiguous character string in the format "YYYY-MM-DD". Reference date for the source (typically census or survey).

date2

Same than date1 but for observation 2.

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
# Albania
alb_males <- census_method(c(1326536, 566784, 687820),
                           c(1441428,848609,762845),
                           c(60, 65, 70), "1981/3/1", "1998/3/2")
alb_females <- census_method(c(929401,435774,487321),
                             c(1241433,698000,624473),
                             c(60, 65, 70), "1981/3/1", "1998/3/2")
c(alb_males$q60_15, alb_females$q60_15)
} # }
